item.title: Top Git Commands
item.description: git clone This command allows you to clone repository.

item.title: Investment Management System
item.description: This web application is made for Mutual Fund Distributors. They get the live NAV of the mutual funds from the Official AMFI website. The distributors can keep a track of the funds allocated to their clients. They can also download reports of particular clients in the form of pdf. Technologies - Python Django Chart.js SQLite3

item.title: Vehicle Traffic Analysis and Analytics System
item.description: In this project vehicles are detected from a surveillance video camera and then classified into HMV, LMV and SMV using Python and OpenCV API. Vehicle data is stored in a MySQL database. Analytics Dashboard is built using Flask and Google Charts are used to render graphs. Technologies Used - Python Flask OpenCV Google Charts

item.title: About
item.description: Hey There! I am Aditya Bagad, Welcome to my small space on the web. I hold a degree in B.E. Computer Science and Iâ€™m currently working as a Data Engineer Intern. I love to code and I code primarily in Python language. I am extremely passionate about solving problems and this passion of mine has driven me towards exploring and building full stack python web/data applications. I’m mostly interested in Big Data Technologoes and DevOps.
